column5: Black Creek Spawning Survey  www.creditvalleycons.com  Help conduct a survey of trout spawning areas. Beginners will be matched with experts to identify Brown trout redds (nests) as part of a long term monitoring program.   Location: Meet at Acton Community Centre on Highway 7  Time: October 24, 9:00 a.m. to 12 p.m.  Cost: Free  Contact: Sherwin Watson-Leung of Credit Valley Conservation at (905) 670-1615 ext. 447
